Title: War 2
Plot: Major Kabir Dhaliwal returns to combat a new threat to the nation in a perilous undercover mission.

Title: Good Bad Ugly
Plot: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

Title: Coolie
Plot: Delves into a man's relentless quest for vengeance since youth, driven by righting past wrongs, shaping his very existence.

Title: The Conjuring:Last Rites
Plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren take on one last terrifying case involving mysterious entities they must confront.

Title: Thalapathy 69
Plot: A tribal warrior's fierce struggle to save his people a millennium ago is mysteriously linked to a shadow cop's perilous quest in the present.

Title: Avengers:Secret Wars
Plot: Set in the Northern Kerala in 1900, 1950 and 1990, three generations of heroes, Maniyan, Kunjikelu and Ajayan, try to protect the most important treasure of the land.

Title: Max thieriot
Plot: Max Thieriot was born in 1988 in Los Altos Hills, California, and has two siblings. He was raised in Occidental, CA, and graduated from Sonoma Country Day School in 2002 and El Molino High School in 2006.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon
Plot: Follows a young Viking as he aspires to hunt dragons, and how he unexpectedly becomes a friend of a young dragon.

Title: Baby John
Plot: Revolve around a DCP who transforms and travels to different place in order to safeguard his family.

Title: Mufasa: The Lion King
Plot: Mufasa, a cub lost and alone, meets a sympathetic lion named Taka, the heir to a royal bloodline.

Title: Werewolves
Plot: Two scientists try to stop a mutation that turns people into werewolves after being touched by a super-moon the year before.

Title: Your Fault
Plot: Despite their parents' efforts to separate them, Noah and Nick's love seems unbreakable. However, work and college open their lives to new relationships.

Title: Nobody Wants This
Plot: An agnostic sex podcaster and a newly single rabbi fall in love; discovering if their relationship survive their wildly different lives and meddling families.

Title: Deva
Plot: Around a brilliant yet rebellious police officer who uncovers a web of deceit and betrayal while investigating a high-profile case.
